data.eml:eml: Revision of the Antarctic species of Halecium Oken, 1815 (Cnidaria, Hydrozoa, Haleciidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Peña Cantero, Álvaro L. (2014): Revision of the Antarctic species of Halecium Oken, 1815 (Cnidaria, Hydrozoa, Haleciidae). Zootaxa 3790 (2): 243-280, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3790.2.2
